meanings.definition: Having breasts; having prominent or well-developed breasts.
meanings.sent1: She felt self-conscious in her new swimsuit, which emphasized her boobed figure.
meanings.sent2: The model confidently strutted down the runway, showcasing her boobed physique.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggeratedly boobed appearance always made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood tall and boobed against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of a boobed woman in a beautiful and empowering way.

meanings.definition: Made a foolish or careless mistake.
meanings.sent1: He boobed by forgetting his keys at home and had to go back to get them.
meanings.sent2: She often boobed by mixing up important dates and appointments.
meanings.sent3: The comedian boobed during his stand-up routine, mixing up his punchlines.
meanings.sent4: The student boobed on the test by misreading the instructions.
meanings.sent5: The chef boobed by adding sugar instead of salt to the recipe, creating a disastrous dish.

meanings.definition: Past tense of the verb 'boob', meaning to make a foolish or careless mistake.
meanings.sent1: She realized she had boobed when she saw the error in her report.
meanings.sent2: He boobed yesterday by sending the email to the wrong recipient.
meanings.sent3: The team boobed during the game, leading to their defeat.
meanings.sent4: The actor boobed on stage by forgetting his lines in the middle of the play.
meanings.sent5: The driver boobed by taking the wrong turn and getting lost in the unfamiliar neighborhood.
